item.title: Mapping with oce
item.description: There are many different things that requires oceanographers to code and write scripts that automate routinely analytical frameworks. However, there is one common use amongst almost all every report, research project or paper will need to haveâ€”map indicating to a study area. There are many packages that are often used to make maps in R. And heaps of blog posts, books and tutorials that illustrate different ways to visualize spatial data in R.
